content.description:
Directions: Each set of lettered choices below refers to the numbered statement immediately following it. Select the one lettered choice that best fits the statement. A choice may be used once, more than once, or not at all.

Refer to the following gaseous molecules:

(A) BeCl2

(B) SO2

(C) N2

(D) F2
content.question: Is the molecule in which the intramolecular forces are strongest

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
